Congratulations to the Mountaintop Odd Waffles on their performance at the FIRST LEGO League’s PA East Regional Championship on Saturday. This was our rookie year and we are extremely proud of the team. We have learned so much since September. The team constructed LEGO missions to exact specifications, learned basic EV3 Mindstorm programming, designed and built an autonomous robot, troubleshot design issues, and developed an innovative solution to a real-world public space problem. The team members had to present each aspect to a panel of judges, complete with four interview sessions, and run their robot under the pressure of time and an audience.

The real reward was in watching the Odd Waffles transition from six individuals that talked over each other and emphasized self-interest to a dynamic team that embodied the STEM, communication, and perseverance qualities valued in today’s world. I cannot wait to see what they will do next!

Thank you to the parents of the Odd Waffles for all your support and time and snacks!
